name: Luigi's Pac-Mansion
description:
This fan game was the brainchild of a 5 year old boy. It was built for him, and to his specifications. He thought it'd be fun to share it with the world! It is a combination of the original Pac-Man and the Gamecube classic, Luigi's Mansion.

Some characters and assets (c) Nintendo and Namco. Custom sprites and background tiles by Adam "Holmfry" Holmes. Music by ACBGamer24 of Newgrounds.com. Based on source code by icuurd12b42 of Gamemaker Community.
